entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
